patch 8.2.0570: Vim9: no error when omitting type from argument

Problem:    Vim9: no error when omitting type from argument.
Solution:   Enforce specifying argument types.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0570: Vim9: no error when omitting type from argument · vim/vim@6e94978
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no error when omitting type from argument. Solution: Enforce specifying argument types.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0015795baafaf7983875f979f92339375fe5d8e2|patch 8.2.0571: double free when passing invalid argument to job_start()>
patch 8.2.0571: double free when passing invalid argument to job_start()

Problem:    Double free when passing invalid argument to job_start().
Solution:   Clear the argument when freed. (Masato Nishihata, closes #5926)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0571: double free when passing invalid argument to job_start() · vim/vim@0015795
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0571: double free when passing invalid argument to job_start() · vim/vim@0015795
attachments.text: Problem: Double free when passing invalid argument to job_start(). Solution: Clear the argument when freed. (Masato Nishihata, closes #5926)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/df1956075d9ff7b5869fb548734bc2a7be2bce44|patch 8.2.0572: using two lines for free and reset>
patch 8.2.0572: using two lines for free and reset

Problem:    Using two lines for free and reset.
Solution:   Use VIM_CLEAR() instead. (Yegappan Lakshmanan)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0572: using two lines for free and reset · vim/vim@df19560
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0572: using two lines for free and reset · vim/vim@df19560
attachments.text: Problem: Using two lines for free and reset. Solution: Use VIM_CLEAR() instead. (Yegappan Lakshmanan)

patch 8.2.0573: using :version twice leaks memory

Problem:    using :version twice leaks memory
Solution:   Only initialize variables once. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5917)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0573: using :version twice leaks memory · vim/vim@278e838
attachments.text: Problem: using :version twice leaks memory Solution: Only initialize variables once. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5917)
